page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PAUL
page.content: I live in Leonardston Road, Mascle Bridge and I go to{Milford Haven {Grammar School.}In the morning I meet the school bus down the road and when I come home I get dropped off there as well. I walk home past Phillip's Walk, past council houses, past some more houses and then home. I get changed and do my{homework, then I go out and pull some carrots up and feed them to the cows over the fence in the field behind my house. Some evenings I go to the{farm}up the road and{help Mr. Roberts}to do some jobs. Other evenings I go out riding my {B.M.X. bike.}I enjoy it very much,and I can do all sorts of stunts from wheelies to bunny hops. When I get home it is late so I go to{bed. by{Paul}Evans.
